chapters.title: Chapter 5: A Different Dance
chapters.info: Lord Talmanes Delovinde, p. 109 (140)—A Cairhienin military commander, about three years older than Mat and about a head shorter. His con is three yellow stars on a blue field. His banner is a black fox. He rarely smiles, and reminds Mat of a compressed spring. He commands about half of Mat's cavalry in the Band of the Red Hand.
